dialog_1.name: Sister
dialog_1.text: Is that Brother's old camera? I used it recently. It may be old but it can still produce amazing pictures.

dialog_2.name: Sister
dialog_2.text: Do you know how to use? Just press the button Y to take picture.

dialog_3.name: Sister
dialog_3.text: Good place to take picture? Let me think...

dialog_4.name: Sister
dialog_4.text: Have you heard Orchard Theatre is opening on 06 Jan? Maybe you can try your luck there.
